title: Provision New Hire Equipment
description: As part of the onboarding process, HR needs to trigger a request for IT to provision a laptop and phone for a new hire.

tasks.description: Identify the new hire and their role/department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Onboarding specialist identifies the new hire's record.

tasks.description: Determine the standard equipment package for the new hire's role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist determines the role requires a standard developer laptop.

tasks.description: Create a service ticket for the IT department with the new hire's details and required equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist successfully creates an IT ticket for hardware provisioning.
